name: HolidazeHalloweenRadio
0:
”Alexa, open Holidays Halloween Radio”
”Alexa, start Holidays Halloween Radio”
”Alexa, play Holidays Halloween Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: holidays halloween radio
des:
You can now listen to Holidaze Halloween Radio on your Alexa-enabled smart devices.

The one and only Holidaze Halloween Radio! You haven't lived until we've scared you to death! Halloween/horror radio. Playing a huge mix of horror punk, horror surf, murder ballads, Gothic Americana, doo-wop, metal, psychobilly, novelty songs, splatter platters, oldies, goth, dark cabaret, dark ambient, haunt music, soundtracks, movie scores and more!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
